mapper.select: SELECT s.*, d.name departmentName FROM student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.departmentId = d.id ORDER BY s.id LIMIT #{start}, #{sz}
SELECT s.*, d.name departmentName FROM student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.departmentId = d.id WHERE #{di} = 0 OR #{di} = s.departmentId ORDER BY s.id LIMIT #{start}, #{sz}
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET studentNo = #{studentNo}, name = #{name}, departmentId = #{departmentId}, sex = #{sex}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT student (studentNo, name, departmentId, sex, phone, email) VALUES (#{studentNo}, #{name}, #{departmentId}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{email})
